title: The Chase
description: In this exciting adventure of dog versus cat, students will enjoy reading a familiar plot. The Chase is full of amusing action and rhyme on every page.
reviewWords: chased, crud, ditch, escaped, fellow, field, flash, leapt, meadow, shore, spat
awareness: Long Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate medial long /e/ vowel sound
wordWork: Concept Words                : Recognize and understand position words
